resources.string: Where students from all districts are united to learn.
This restless house may end up trapping you within its walls.
The right place to have a peaceful talk with the undying.
Observe the duplication of any form of life at first hand.
A novel serves as the connection between humans and fantasy.
Learn about a dark future you would normally avoid facing.
If you\'re lucky, you may boost your holiday budget here.
A friendly celebration that will make you fond of nightmares.
Its location changes depending on which district holds the power.
Contains both normal books and portals to other dimensions.
Look twice at the menu unless you really love trying new dishes.
In such a diverse town normal clothes would certainly stand out.
Contains drugs and remedies for anything you can imagine.
Purchase your next best friend but don\'t forget to pamper them.
This is why you needn\'t be afraid of being turned into a toad.
This will secure your trip to the Infernal Pools district.
The right place to start the exploration of a controversial art.
The easiest way to get to Conundrum\'s Core without being lost.
If you have a knack for riddles this is the place for you.
Bright and generous, these woods will make you question life.
An inexhaustible source of wealth -if you ever find it.
Prepare thoroughly or its stillness will soon spread to you too.
The supply center for the vast majority of businesses.
Make sure to keep away unless you have a suicide wish.
Depending on your capabilities, get ready to eat or be eaten.
Be prepared because this forest will try to keep you for itself.
Its residents are unwelcoming unless you wish to serve.
Its enchanted nature resembles Wonderland. This is the homeland of elves, fairies, and practically anything aside from stones.
The entire district is invisible to those unable to cast spells. You will need to gain the witches\' trust before trying to enter.
Spectres, skeletons and zombies constitute its majority. It is said that the secret to immortality is hidden among those tombstones.
The land of angels, in its finest purity. Travellers are tested thoroughly before entering in order to avoid disturbing the peace.
Here you will either be punished or rediscover freedom. Treat the demons will respect and they will not forget your kindness.
This ancient woodland is now inhabited by werewolves. They are friendly to anyone who does not endanger the living or the undead.
Befriend dragons and countless other mythical creatures in this wild habitat. This is the ideal location for adventurers.
The secrets of this underwater district remain a mystery. If the sirens and mermaids trust you enough, you may come to discover some of them.
The loneliest yet most elegant area in town. The vampires residing it seem to avoid leaving their manors unless it\'s dark outside.
